snippet.title: BIT.TRIP BEAT Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
BIT.TRIP BEAT marks the beginning of CommanderVideo's epic journey of the soul with:
* Up to 4 Player Local Co-op!
* Crazy Boss Battles!
* Ultra-Precise Wii Remote Motion Controls!
* A Crazy Chiptune-Inspired Soundtrack!
* Special Chiptune Guest Star Bit Shifter!
* Classic Gameplay With Brain-Melting Visuals!
* Intriguing Cutscenes!
Download BIT.TRIP BEAT and start your own BIT.TRIP today!
Available for PC, Mac, Linux, WiiWare, iPhone, iPod Touch, iPad, and Android!
